snippet: As the crisis with North Korea escalates, critics and supporters alike wonder if President Park Geun-hye may have gone too far in presenting herself as an ultra-tough leader.
abstract: South Korean President Park Geun-hye's upbringing has made her as steely a leader as they come; now at the center of an escalating crisis with North Korea critics and supporters alike wonder if she may have gone too far in presenting herself as an ultratough leader.
lead_paragraph: As the crisis with North Korea escalates, critics and supporters alike wonder if President Park Geun-hye may have gone too far in presenting herself as an ultra-tough leader.

headline.seo: Park Geun-hye, Steely Leader of South Korea, Is Battle-Ready
headline.main: Steely Leader of South Korea Is Battle-Ready
headline.print_headline: Steely Leader Of South Korea Is Battle-Ready
